"Hey, my friend!": "There's no reason to be so embarrassed. I'm talking to you, you! Someone who shares my own will, in other words, my best friend!"
"Hey, hey, Josephine, stop pecking me, stop. I'm not dinner, you know."
"Oh right, my friend, this is your first time meeting her. How is Josephine? Isn't she cute? Her huge appetite is also part of her charm."
"That piercing look of staring down prey that she gives me sometimes is also cute, you know?"
"Oh, that's right! Are you giving your children the proper energy they need?"
"They are a unique existence after all; we supply the energy source as they mature."
"In a way, the love we pour in takes to the skies. Isn't that right, Josephine?"
"Hahaha, now, now, being clumsy isn't good. It appears she is hungry. I will take my leave now, my friend."
"Hahaha, Josephine, you don't have to get so worked up. I've prepared a extraordinary dinner today."
"Damn, that was close! Whoa, whoa, are you aiming for the eyeballs? You little rascal you, hahaha."
